question: Which state has been ranked first in meeting the efficiency targets, in the review of State and Central government water departments by the Jal Shakti Ministry?
explanation:
As a part of the mid-term review of the Central and the state government departments by the Jal Shakti Ministry, Gujarat has been ranked first in meeting the efficiency targets, to provide piped drinking water connection to every household in next 5 years.
Delhi is among the worst performing states for the year 2019. The ranking which also listed seven Central departments placed the Survey of India in the first place followed by the National Institute of Hydrology (NIH). The ranking has been done under the National Hydrology Project of the Ministry.
